products.title: Hive Plain White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive plain white perfect fit pleated blind px71001. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hiveplain white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Hive Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive blackout white perfect fit pleated blind px72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive blackout white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Hive Blackout White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive blackout white pleated skylight blind in white. Made to measure from 57.74 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their hive blackout range is available in many beautiful colours and has a very elegant honeycomb texture. 
 
This classic white skylight pleated blind is perfect to add a fresh and crisp feel to any room, this blind is also ideal for the skylight windows in your home.
 
 Product id: db-pls0061 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

This classic white skylight pleated blind is perfect to add a crisp and fresh feel to any room in your home. This blind is also ideal for the skylight windows in your home.
 
 Product id: db-pls0065 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Hive Plain Cellular White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive plain cellular white pleated skylight blind in white. Made to measure from 57.74 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their hive plain celular range is available in many beautiful colours and has a very elegant honeycomb texture. 
 
This white skylight pleated blind is perfect to add a fresh feel to any room in your home and it will look great alongside existing decor. This is the ideal choice for your skylight windows.
  
 Product id: db-pls0073 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
